did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle:
Undergraduate English Honors Theses
1979-1994

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Undergraduate English Honors Theses, Accession #RG-22/1/3.031, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred by the Department of English.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection are honors theses written by students in the Department of English.
